text: The 1897 Washington Agricultural football team was an American football team that represented Washington Agricultural College during the 1897 college football season. The team competed as an independent under head coach Robert Gailey and compiled a record of 2–0. ==Schedule== ==References== Washington Agricultural Category:Washington State Cougars football seasons Category:College football undefeated seasons Category:1897 in Washington (state)
title: 1897 Washington Agricultural football team
